extension.name: MiwoEvents - Events
extension.author: Miwisoft LLC
extension.description: This module is used to show the up-coming events.

field.name: category_ids
field.label: Category IDs
field.description: Enter the IDs of the categories which you want to display events, comma seperated. Leave empty for all categories.

field.name: show_category
field.label: Show Category Name
field.description: Choose whether to show or hide category name.

field.name: show_location
field.label: Show Location
field.description: Choose whether to show or hide location of events.

field.name: number_events
field.label: Number of Events
field.description: Number of events to be shown.
